subtitle: African American freedmen communities of Austin, Texas, 1865-1928
title: And grace will lead me home
subjects: African American neighborhoods -- Texas -- Austin -- History -- 19th century
African American neighborhoods -- Texas -- Austin -- History -- 20th century

description.value: "Focuses on the history of black freedmen communities in Austin, Texas, from 1865 to 1928. After emancipation at least fifteen freedmen communities formed in Austin and nearby rural settlements, disappearing by 1928. Covers the births and deaths of these communities; also describes the lives of those who lived there"--Provided by publisher.
